page.title: 10Vicar of Parish Church
page.content: The life of the vicar is very varied. His work is split into two parts, to conduct worship and to care for the people of the parish. There is at the moment a shortage of vicars so Canon Staples is responsible for more than one parish. His day off is Monday and his busiest day of the week is Wednesday. He gets three weeks off every year and two or three days after Christmas and Easter. He has to prepare services. The Church The church is cleaned by voluntary helpers. There are about a dozen bell ringers. A lot of tourists go to the church to see the old Norman font.
